lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin stretched out his arms in celebration, teammates mobbed him along the boards and jubilant fans launched their hats onto the ice.

headline.print_headline: Ovechkin's 16th Hat Trick Sends Caps to 4-3 Win Over Blues
headline.main: Ovechkin's 16th Hat Trick Sends Caps to 4-3 Win Over Blues
